short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find social analytics for crypto influencers on Twitter, powered using the LunarCrush API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a box to the top right of twitter when you go to a profile page, and will show you the most important social analytics about that influencer.

Twitter Social Analytics Include:
►Top Mentioned Coins
►Follower Rank
►Engagement Rank
►Influencer Rank
►And more coming soon!
